title: Impact of BSA and Au3+ concentration on the formation and fluorescence properties of Au nanoclusters
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19284-19293
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01140F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tao Li, Zhuo Li, Fengjiao Chen, Liying Zhu, Hua Tang, Dan Wang, Zhenrong Tang
Bovine serum albumin-stabilized Au nanoclusters (BSA-Au NCs) have emerged as promising contenders for imaging agents and highly sensitive fluorescence sensors due to their biocompatibility and strong photoluminescence.
